name: Trolls vs Robots
description:
Trolls vs Robots is a 2 Player Real Time Strategy Game that plays itself.

Create epic battles, gain experience, make units cheaper and enjoy the chaos.

Credits:

Agustín Pérez Burgos - Programming

Julieta Rivero - Art

Ignacio Pérez Burgos - 3D modeling and music

JuanPablo Pérez Burgos - 3D modeling
